Title: Isolation
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Robert Kirkman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery.
